website_summaries.verdict: Well priced decorations that don't sacrifice on quality.
pros: Set includes paper lanterns, honeycombs, and pom poms
Foil balloons, “It’s A Girl” banner, and “Baby Shower” banner also included
All decorations packed efficiently into one small box
Comes with tool for inflating balloons
cons: Foil B balloon looks like a C until it's inflated, which can be confusing

customer_reviews.title: Similar yet, Pretty decorations
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for a work baby shower. Thought the pricing was good and was surprised by the amount of items that came in such a small box. When the box first arrived, I thought that there had to be another box on the way, but everything is packaged efficiently to probably save on shipping costs. We used all the decorations for the baby shower and people were impressed by the look and designs. Inflating with the straw took some getting used to but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get everything...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if I got everything that was pictured. I ordered this because I wanted the “oh baby” balloons and I did NOT receive it. I was so disappointed, I didn’t even have time to try to get one because the baby shower was the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little bundle!
customer_reviews.text: These balloons are adorable, the perfect mix of pink without being overpowering. I combined the balloons with a balloon arch I also purchased off Amazon and both of them together was just what envisioned! The banner looked a bit cheap but matched my expectations based off the item photos so I was not disappointed when it came in the mail. The poms are always a struggle for me to pull apart and puff up but these I was able to do without ripping any. Overall great purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Livvy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING quality -- looks expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I did a TON of research on the best "all-in-one" baby shower decorations kit on Amazon, and this one did not disappoint! It was the PERFECT amount of supplies to fully deck-out my colleague's cubicle. Everything came in great condition, it was all very easy to assemble, and looked very high quality. We received so many compliments about the fabulous decorations! 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: HowdagerTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: didn't receive the balloon&  plus the flowers were a pain to put together time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Cute decorations the little flowers and big flowers were a pain to make separating each little piece of tissue definitely had to do the day before the shower and I did not receive the gold balloons that say oh baby I had to go to the store and buy those so everything that's pictured is not in the kit that was a little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: KIM WROBLEWSKI

customer_reviews.title: the letters are right
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and I read the reviews stating letters came in wrong and a bunch that said it was fine, so for the price i took a chance since i have a few weeks before the shower. At first i pulled the balloons out and thought i too didn't get the right letters...until i blew up the "C's" the fold inwards and are b's etc! So glad I went ahead and ordered this set, it is a great value for the price!! All looks great!
customer_reviews.author: DebWheels

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong balloon letters
customer_reviews.text: The letters that I got for the "OH BABY" balloons spelled out "UH CACY." It was a little funny but ultimately disappointing. The sphere lanterns and the banners were great but the things that were supposed to look like large flowery tissue paper looked so terrible that we just threw them right in the trash. I wouldn't recommend getting this set, especially if you're interested in the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great decorations at a great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal considering everything you get. The "oh baby" balloons were super cute, the banners, and other decorations were as expected and were enough for the baby shower I hosted. I received many compliments on the decor and it was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect collection
customer_reviews.text: We had so beautiful Baby Shower today, and we used this all of this stuff for decoration !! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: The whole set is super cute and the theme is adorable. However, the ensemble was HORRIBLE. The balloons were falling apart and the letters didnt properly form the words. There were so many pieces we ended up not using because it was just ridiculous how difficult things were to put together.
customer_reviews.author: viv

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend. Made my sister's baby shower look beautiful. I received many compliments on the decorations. The only down fall was the pom pom balls that were included weren't as good looking as the ones that were pictured so we didn't end up using but other than that everything was as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The banners were so cute but unfortunately the oh baby balloons were not sturdy! I tried blowing them up and the B bursted immediately. The balls were so hard to fan out. The lanterns and banners are really all that served a purpose for us but not worth $21.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for a baby shower we threw for a coworker. My only complain is the paper flowers sucked and were not easy to pull apart and make look fluffy and cute. I’d suggest replacing them with other lanterns or just something else.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the amount of items to cost ratio. I didn’t have high expectations thinking they would look cheap and flimsy; but I was wrong. They went perfectly well with the classy theme of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: EvieO

customer_reviews.title: Nice decorations
customer_reviews.text: We used these decorations for a baby shower last week. It was a nice assortment of decorations. You should read the directions before using them. Some comments were incorrect regarding the OH BABY balloons. They are definitely the right letters once inflated. We used everything in the package - just be careful with the tissue paper flowers since they can obviously tear easily. Overall I would order these again the next time we have a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna C. Schroder

customer_reviews.title: “Oh Cacy”
customer_reviews.text: The decorations were cute, however the banner said “Ith a girl” instead of “It’s a girl” and the balloons did not spell out “Oh Baby.” There were two Cs instead of two Bs.. I was a little upset about that, but the shower turned out cute and everyone had a good laugh over the banner. We just decided not to even attempt to blow up the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Sant

customer_reviews.title: Really good items at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: This package of part goods is such a good price! There is so much in it. Everything turned out perfect. I was worried the balloons would be difficult to inflate but I was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Collins

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: the colors are nice but the flower pom poms are awful they won't even open is the worst material ever they come apart even before you even try to put it together
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks really nice. The flowers were kind of tedious to make but they came out real cute
customer_reviews.author: Phi D.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Although we didn’t use everything, the decorations turned out so cute! Loved all of this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Uriah J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The decorations in this kit were great and provided almost all the decorations needed for the baby shower. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L_walk

customer_reviews.title: Oh baby!
customer_reviews.text: Great set and one stop setup! Shipped right to my door and didn’t have to sift through aisles of things and people.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: This will make your Party!
customer_reviews.text: This decoration kit is so adorable! Great quality and good amount of decor you get for the money. Planning a baby shower there is no way I would be able to find these items with the quality at local craft stores. I will be ordering these kits for future party's without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a co-workers office baby shower. Mom-to-be liked it so much that I helped her repackage everything so she can re-use the decorations in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ivane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought a hand pump at the dollar store to inflate the “OH BABY” balloons and it worked perfectly. The whole kit is really cute and worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Choquette

customer_reviews.title: Sweet baby shower decor kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I picked this one. It had everything in one kit. Gorgeous colors. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meza

customer_reviews.title: “Oh baby” balloons  not so great
customer_reviews.text: The oh baby balloons were small, and don’t actually float with helium. The letters b and a also deflated within the first 30 minutes. Seems like a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this kit this weekend. It came packaged very nicely and seems good durable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Izzie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting this because of the previous comments. But i’m so happy I did! Good quality, everything it’s on the box and came in on time. Besides isnt expensive
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Oh baby is very nice !
customer_reviews.text: This looked very pretty ! I didn’t use everything in the packet. I used balloons to add more to backdrop. Picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Z.

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a lot of stuff. I didn’t use it all. But definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Deisy Brito

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to decorate our conference room for a baby shower and it was a hit! Everyone loved the decorations and couldn't believe it was such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Balloons Incorrect & Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The "O" balloon was not included in the package, and the "A" balloon had a tear along the seam so that it could not be inflated. The only option for a refund is to return the entire item, including all of the decorations that I actually need for the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be perfect for a baby shower, however they sent two Cs instead of two Bs for the oh baby ballons. plus when i got the ballons filled one popped and the others wouldnt float not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: All pieces came as advertised, looked super cute for our shower! This is a great value for all the items included.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Great price and so many decorations. Love the hanging balls they definitely added to the theme. Pleasantly surprised when revived at the number of items.
customer_reviews.author: shianne4

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you could possibly need for decorating a baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Ashra Acharya

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: I loved the decorations. Very flashy. I believe they could have came with some intructions on how to assemble and disassemble though.
customer_reviews.author: Kilee

customer_reviews.title: Picture is sooo much better than actual prodcut
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed by products - the picture showed a much better quality than what was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Curl

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: The package did not come with all the letter balloons for the “ohh baby” and there wasn’t any strings attached to hang up the balloons so we used tape!!! Just open package and items before the day of the party
customer_reviews.author: heba zoma

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The decor is very cute. So worth it . And everyone loved it
customer_reviews.author: CanoCivic

customer_reviews.title: This product was defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on the 10/3 and we had our babyshower on 11/18 and when getting ready to use this item the Oh Baby balloon was defective and we could not air it up and it ruined our baby shower and our plans
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These decorations are cute, we didnt end up using the paper poof ball things because when we separated the paper they didnt look round or cute.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Richards

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Missing items in the package. The balloons and baby shower sign were not included.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H. Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Wrong balloons
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful set but we orginially chose it because of the baloons. We didn’t get the right balloons, no ‘h’ 2 ‘c’s and a ‘u’ doesn’t spell anything. It was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bari

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors can't wait to see them all out up.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie artice

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as described. Does take a little assembly to make the Pom Pom’s.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Balloons not included...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my friends baby shower and very disappointed coz it didn't have the foil balloons that should've came with it....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This entire package was a very good purchase! Very cute decorations, and it arrived on time for our event! Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarabrooke14

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assemble but great decorations for a baby shower at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for a friend’s baby shower. This was the perfect amount of decor for the room without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Castles

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: These were so great! I loved this and made decor so much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Selinajaimes

customer_reviews.title: Missing the a letter from the banner.
customer_reviews.text: Everything nice but missing the letter H for the banner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We used everything in package All easy to assemble Vey pretty
customer_reviews.author: kristielynne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions, easy to assemble just a little time consuming when it comes to the fluffy ones
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Woodruff/Tonya Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy or waist of money on this. super mad cause you count on this dictations for a invent and the “it a girl “ & “baby shower” do not spell that !
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Great price and cute for baby girl baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: The decorations came out so cute and were super easy to put up. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wrong printing of banner
customer_reviews.text: One of the banners was misprinted. It said "it's a girg"
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Obviously I added some more paper flowers to make it fuller but I’m super happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly@ALLOAK

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: So simple, everything you need to decorate in one bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are cute!
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t end up needing all of the pieces. We hung what we could, and it made for a very cute space for the baby shower! The “Oh Baby” hanging balloons were a big hit. Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, just lots of work to put all 5he decorations together.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Araujo

customer_reviews.title: ALL ITEMS INCLUDED. GREAT SERVICE !!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely , everything In place and ALL items were here ! The only thing I can think of to make this go better would be if the letters for the banners were already put in order.
customer_reviews.author: Alika

product_meta.title: KREATWOW Girls Baby Shower Party Decorations It’s A Girl Baby Shower Decorations Kit with It’s A Girl Banner Tissue Paper Pompoms Lanterns Honeycomb Balls
feature_bullets: Baby Shower Decorations Kit: 8 paper pompom flowers(white, light pink, ivory peach), 3 paper lanterns(white, peach, cream white), 4 paper honeycomb balls(light pink, champagne), 1 pink BABY SHOWER banner, 1 pink IT’S A GIRL banner. Great set baby shower decorations for girl.

Perfect for It’s A Girl Decoration: The vibrant color of mixed paper pompoms, paper honeycombs and lanterns will add a warm and elegant atmosphere to your party, perfect for your baby shower decoration, girl’s first birthday party, also great as home decoration.

Multiple Application: Baby shower decorations can not only be used for pink and gold baby shower decoration, the premium quality also be wonderful as birthday party or photo props. Also a great idea to decorate your baby’s room, nursery room after baby’s party.

Need to Assemble: Each paper pompoms and paper balls comes with a short ribbon for display, paper lanterns arrives with a metal frame expander, all you need is to fluff them out with step by step instruction, and assemble baby shower it’s a girl banner. Any issues, welcome to contact our customer team to seek for help.
Rest Assured to Order: A friendly customer service stands behind our items, please contact our customer service team if you are not completely satisfied with our decorations.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars192 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
